verbose_text: An elevated WBC count does not indicate a specific disease by itself, however, is correlated with infection, systemic illness, inflammation, allergy, leukemia, and tissue injury caused due to burns, etc. Although, more research is needed on the relationship between altered AGO2 mRNA expression level and aberrant WBC counts as a inflammatory marker, this finding suggested that downregulated AGO2 mRNA expression level in the patient with SSNHL may be associated with cochlear inflammation or systemic inflammatory condition in the disease.
